name: The Tree Of Life (caseyscreamsback)
description:
This is a game made with love for someone posting on the forum at heartsupport.com

Water the tree every day to see it grow!

It's a metaphor for recovery, life, and reaching your goals.  You don't always see progress right away, but if you keep showing up, putting in the work, you WILL see growth.

Controls
Move: Left/Right Arrows

Action: Spacebar

Twirl: Hold T
